articles.content: The share allocation in Laxmi Organic IPO, which was subscribed 107 times and closed last week, has been finalised today. Link Intime India Private, the registrar of the issue, will manage share allo… [+2137 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Central govt's tax collection on petrol, diesel jumps 300% in six years - Economic Times
articles.description: Central government's tax collections on petrol and diesel have jumped over 300 per cent in the last six years as excise duty on the two fuels was hiked, the Lok Sabha was informed on Monday.
articles.content: Central government's tax collections on petrol and diesel have jumped over 300 per cent in the last six years as excise duty on the two fuels was hiked, the Lok Sabha was informed on Monday. The cent… [+2264 chars]
